work.name: Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.
work.summary: Led music information retrieval (MIR) research and developed several state-of-the-art MIR models, including singing skill evaluation, singing transcription, beat detection, and music recommendation.
highlights: Creator of the Huawei Intelligent feature ‘Xiaoyi Band’, which automatically arranges accompaniment for the input singing melody.

work.name: Tencent Music Entertainment
work.summary: Developed a chord embedding model using self-supervised learning, achieving 0.661 MAP on cover-songidentification, an impressive performance given its zero-shot nature. Developed a beatmap generation system, which outputs game-ready beatmaps based on MIDI or lyrical inputs.

Dissertation: Addressing Ambiguity in Supervised Machine Learning: A Case Study on Automatic Chord Labelling

Thesis: Research on Automatic Chord Arrangement Based on Deep Recurrent Neural Networks
